author: nc1234
content: Wait I just realized I am running an old prysm image. Can you publish a new one with the fix on deposit_requests_start_index?

author: jih2nn
content:
Here you go! Please note that it successfully upgrades to eip7805 but breaks Dora once it reaches to epoch 2 (the PR is WIP regarding this.)

```
    cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: jihoonsg/prysm-beacon-chain-focil:5b1c9c3
    vc_type: prysm
    vc_image: jihoonsg/prysm-validator-focil:5b1c9c3
```
